description: Once dubbed "The greatest battle implement ever devised" by General Patton, the M1 Garand is a no-nonsense semi-automatic rifle great for those long shots. Go on, you know you want to get it just to hear that iconic "ping" don't you?
$100,000 added to your funds will help you stay stocked up on all the best stuff.

The Wipeout from Zombie Combat Systems seizes the fact that Zombies didn't sign up to the Geneva convention. Say hello to a high powered assault rifle that delivers 28 grams of weaponized White Phosphorous to immolate your targets. Say hello to screaming burning fury my shambling friends.

Harder. Deadlier. Richer. And fast-tracked for promotion. This'll be you, with the XSAS Skills Pack. All the premium skills in one bundle will give you a subtle but powerful advantage. Including Health Regen, Extra Damage, More Cash for Kills, and More XP for Kills.

itemname: Total Domination Pack of Super Awesome!
description: Everything, ever-e-thing. The TDPSA gives you all premium guns (including any new SAS3 (flash version) guns that may be added in future) as well as: More Cash Per Kill, More XP per Kill, Health Regen, More Damage, and $250,000 of in-game cash (to sleep on) and sets your rank to Commander, which unlocks all the perks and guns associated with that rank.
Get yourself those stripes, stars or whatever is next without quite so much hard work.
Shrug off those minor (or even major) injuries and watch your health slowly creep back up. Health regen is going to make you an even tougher nut for these zombies to crack.
Adding a 50% xp bonus for every zombie nailed, More XP for Kills will rank you up in no-time.
Blow the gold right off their teeth! More cash for kills will give you a +50% earn rate on all cash received for zombie kills. Go ahead, buy yourself something pretty.
A 25% boost to all your weapons damage will seriously turbo-boost your kill rate.
All premium guns in one large package. Includes any future SAS3 guns that may be added later on.

Uses Special Ammo. The coolest thing about zombies is that unlike humans they don't know to run away screaming at the sight of a guy wearing a massive backpack of napalm holding a hose. The M2 is a grand weapon for fighting the horde mainly because the whole place begins to smell like barbecue.

Uses Special Ammo. The Coil Assault Weapon or CAW developed by JKH Industries in 2011 is a cutting edge electromagnetic coil or "Gauss" gun that accelerates a 0.887Cal tungsten projectile to over 6600 metres per second to produce a sub-plasma bolt for very effective hurt-bringing. Semi-automatic and able to take the wings of a jet fighter at 12 km the CAW will bring quite the kick to your next party. Did we mention it shoots through walls?

Uses Special Ammo. The M41-A is the standard issue primary of Space Marines in the distant future. We got our hands on one and beefed it up to 12.7mm caseless goodness in its new "Grendel" configuration. Mobility? - check. Power? - check. Accuracy? check. The complete package. Military technology FTW.
Uses Special Ammo. Like to hang back and wreak devastation from range? The RPG can take out large areas of zombies perfect for clearing rooms and bumping your kill count nicely.

Uses Light Machine Gun Ammo Typically deployed on the ground or mounted somewhere using robust bolts, this trimmed down version still rolls in at 30kg and really limited to those with massive, caber-tossing arms. The M2 fires many, many big bullets very, very fast. Eats zombies for breakfast.

Uses shotgun ammo. Most would agree that against walking piles of half rotted flesh the shotgun makes a grand weapon. Easily accessible and devastating. What's better than a shotgun? The offspring of an illicit encounter between a regular shotgun and an assault rifle = automatic shotgun.

Uses Assault Rifle Ammo. The best defense vs zombies is offense. More lead per second is the offensive goal here, and for an assault rifle the Beowulf is second to none. Enormous mushrooming slugs leave an exit wound about the size of... well, at least the size of a zombie.
Uses SMG ammo. The PP19 Bizon gives you all the joyous splatter power of an AK47 packed into a package that looks like the gun equivalent of Tommy from Goodfellas. Small and relentlessly violent.
Buying a premium pistol is a smart play as all pistols have unlimited ammo. The G20 is the zombie fighters dream sidearm. Fully automatic 10mm goodness for all your pureeing pleasure.

Buying a premium pistol is a good move as all pistols have unlimited ammo. The Beretta 93R offers a quick 3 round burst and the biggest available 40 round clip making it an awesome sidearm to take out the ragged at range.

8 winged "flechettes" in each round delivering a deadly biotox compound make this a truly savage weapon. If you score the killing blow on a Zombie with this he'll detonate like a grenade sharing his last miserable thoughts (read brains and skull shrapnel) with all other Zombies in the immediate vicinity.
